TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnumerable

summary.span: 公开枚举数，该枚举数支持在非泛型集合上进行简单迭代。

span.span: Exposes an enumerator, which supports a simple iteration over a non-generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可枚举的所有非泛型集合的基接口。 is the base interface for all non-generic collections that can be enumerated. 有关此接口的泛型版本, 请参阅。For the generic version of this interface see . 包含一个方法, 该方法返回一个。 contains a single method, , which returns an . 提供通过公开属性 和方法来循环访问集合的功能。 provides the ability to iterate through the collection by exposing a property and and methods. 最佳做法是在`For Each` 集合类上实现和, 以启用(在VisualBasic)语法,但不需要实现。`foreach`It is a best practice to implement and on your collection classes to enable the `foreach` (`For Each` in Visual Basic) syntax, however implementing is not required. 如果集合未实现, 则仍必须遵循迭代器模式来支持此语法, `GetEnumerator`方法是提供返回接口、类或结构的方法。If your collection does not implement , you must still follow the iterator pattern to support this syntax by providing a `GetEnumerator` method that returns an interface, class or struct. 使用 Visual Basic 时, 必须提供由`GetEnumerator`返回的实现。When using Visual Basic, you must provide an implementation, which is returned by `GetEnumerator`. 当使用C#进行开发时, 必须提供一个类, `Current`该类包含一个`MoveNext` `Reset`属性、和描述的方法, 但该类不必实现。When developing with C# you must provide a class that contains a `Current` property, and `MoveNext` and `Reset` methods as described by , but the class does not have to implement . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了通过实现和接口来循环访问自定义集合的最佳实践。The following code example demonstrates the best practice for iterating a custom collection by implementing the and interfaces. 在此示例中, 不会显式调用这些接口的成员, 而是实现它们以支持使用`foreach` (`For Each`在 Visual Basic) 来循环访问集合。In this example, members of these interfaces are not explicitly called, but they are implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`For Each` in Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. 此示例是一个完整的控制台应用程序。This example is a complete Console app. 若要编译 Visual Basic 应用, 请在项目的 "**属性**" 页中将**启动对象**更改为**Sub Main** 。To compile the Visual Basic app, change the **Startup object** to **Sub Main** in the project's **Properties** page. 有关演示如何实现接口的示例, 请参阅[在集合类中实现 IEnumerable 接口](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Implementing-the-e1708a24)For a sample that shows how to implement the interface, see [Implementing the IEnumerable Interface in a Collection Class](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Implementing-the-e1708a24) [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#1)]

related.span: 迭代器（C# 和 Visual Basic）
在集合类中实现 IEnumerable 接口

span.span: Implementing the IEnumerable Interface in a Collection Class

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 返回循环访问集合的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

returns.span: 一个可用于循环访问集合的 对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `For Each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 方法还将枚举器恢复到此位置。The method also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置, 属性未定义。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此, 在读取的 值之前, 必须调用方法, 以将枚举器前进到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合的末尾, 则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后, 并返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时, 对的后续调用也将返回。 `false`When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用返回`false`, 则未定义。If the last call to returns `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 如果对集合所做的更改 (如添加、修改或删除元素), 则枚举器的行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of the enumerator is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现自定义集合的接口。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此示例中 , 未显式调用, 但实现它是为了支持`foreach`使用 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中)。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`For Each` in Visual Basic). 此代码示例摘自一个更大的接口示例。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#1)]
